--- In gladiator@y..., "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@y...> 
wrote:
> Hmm.  I am suprised no one has a wish list of really significant 
> upgrade features for Gladiator:Beyond Freedom.

This is my last attempt at bringing up significant upgrade features 
that would be too much to put into Gladiator.

Redo the characters are stored to make it faster to determine things 
like who gets hit from explosions, who gets hit next with 
chain-lightning, etc.

Next proposal, redo the program to allow gladiator to acquire extra 
memory (with permission from the user) to help with things like 
chain-lightning.
